projects.title: Website for Online Risk Game
projects.description: A website for an online community that is build upon Warcraft III to play the classic board game Risk. The website includes leaderboard, news about the game and community, streams, a release form to catch the latest updates. Furthermore, it includes a game guide and a promotion for their upcoming new game!

projects.title: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, task assignments, and progress tracking. Made this in our 2nd semester of our Advanced JavaScript Course.

projects.title: Fantasy Festival
projects.description: A fantasy-themed festival website featuring a commercial for the festival.

projects.title: Locally hosted and created Wordpress pages
projects.description: Created different pages for different usages, such as E-Commerce, blogs, info sites etc. All pages are locally hosted using LocalWP.

projects.title: E-Sports Cinema
projects.description: A website dedicated to e-sports events, featuring live streams, event schedules, and player profiles. A website where you can book your seats for an exciting finals or an exciting game or just tournaments in general.
